thread.title: Preparing and Protecting Vulnerable Clients

author: wsjcom
title: Preparing and Protecting Vulnerable Clients
text:
Sheryl Stephens • President at Stephens Wealth Management Group, Flint, Mich. • Education: B.B.A., University of Michigan-Flint
Background: While pursuing an education degree in college, Ms. Stephens secured an internship at an advisory firm. One of the advisers became her mentor, and she was moved to join the profession when she heard clients speak of the positive ways he’d changed their lives. “I realized that advising was a teaching profession, and one where I could do a great deal of good,” Ms. Stephens says. She stayed...
